content: do not end off stitch count 36hdc round 6 note keep the gauge on your scs loose ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc in the same st 1sc in each of the next 35sts join to the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch do not end off stitch count 36sc 6 roun d 7 ch2 decrease in the same st this counts as the 1st cluster-st ch1 skip st cluster-st in the next st ch1 skip st 17 times times join to the top of the beginning cluster-st with a slip_stitch do not end off stitch count 18 cluster-stitches 18 ch1-spaces roun d 10 slip_stitch into the ch1-space ch2 decrease in the same
